properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V POLAR EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLE:
   A. 10 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      02-02.32S 037-57.43W AND 03-01.88S 038-43.32W.
   B. 11 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      01-34.32S 037-49.52W AND 02-55.87S 038-52.35W.
   C. 12 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      01-49.00S 038-14.47W AND 02-49.10S 039-00.80W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 13 FEB.
